messages.subject: OTish observation of the whimsy of life and spam
messages.msgSnippet: Although I don t know that I can quite connect this to unschooling, I would just like to say that I am almost enjoying spam since the proliferation of
messages.messageBody:
Although I don't know that I can quite connect this to unschooling, I would just like to say that I am almost enjoying spam since the proliferation of spam-blocking programs. As I understand it, the blockers looks for certain words/phrases/formulations, so the spammers are trying to avoid that in the way they write the spam -- including the insertion of mispellings and random words.

All of which leads to this:
I just got a spam for no-doc-needed prescript drugs which begins with this text: "errata patriarchy"

-Cat


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
